metadata.feature_description: Basic UI structure and navigation for URL management module

steps.action: Navigate to the website and log in as superuser
steps.expected: User is logged in and can access admin features
steps.actual: User successfully logged in as SuperUser Account

steps.action: Access URL Management module via Persona Bar > Settings > SEO
steps.expected: URL Management module loads with all UI elements
steps.actual: URL Management module loaded successfully showing SEO section with URL Management and Sitemap Settings tabs, sub-tabs (GENERAL SETTINGS, EXTENSION URL PROVIDERS, EXPRESSIONS, TEST URL), and all settings controls properly initialized

steps.action: Click on EXTENSION URL PROVIDERS sub-tab
steps.expected: Tab switches and shows extension URL providers content
steps.actual: Tab switched successfully showing table with NAME and ENABLED columns, listing two Evoq providers with checkboxes and edit icons

steps.expected: Tab switches and shows regular expressions settings
steps.actual: Tab switched successfully showing REGULAR EXPRESSIONS section with multiple regex configuration fields (Ignore URL, Do Not Rewrite URL, Site URLs Only, etc.)

steps.expected: Tab switches and shows URL testing interface
steps.actual: Tab switched successfully showing TEST A PAGE URL section with page selector dropdown, query string field, custom page name field, and TEST URL REWRITING section

steps.action: Click on Sitemap Settings main tab
steps.expected: Tab switches and shows sitemap configuration
steps.actual: Tab switched successfully showing GENERAL SITEMAP SETTINGS section with sitemap URL, cache settings, priority options, and SITEMAP PROVIDERS table

steps.action: Navigate back to URL Management tab and GENERAL SETTINGS
steps.actual: Successfully navigated back to URL Management > GENERAL SETTINGS showing URL REWRITER and URL REDIRECTS sections

steps.expected: UI adapts to narrower viewport without breaking
steps.actual: UI adapted responsively - Persona Bar collapsed to icon-only mode, all tabs remain visible and accessible, content sections adjusted to fit the narrower viewport

observations: Source code files were not accessible in the repository directory (directory appeared empty), but UI-based smoke testing was completed successfully
The URL Management module was already loaded when logged in, suggesting session state persistence from previous usage
All UI controls (toggles, dropdowns, buttons) are properly initialized with current values
Cancel and Save buttons are disabled until changes are made, which is expected behavior
